title: Batman: Arkham Knight's combat challenges get character select today
text:
Batman: Arkham Knight's combat challenges get character select today 
Published By: Eurogamer.net - Today 
One of the most-requested features comes to Batman: Arkham Knight today.The character selection update for the Combat AR Challenges is rolli...
